sanskrit_verse:
एवं चरति यो विप्रो ब्रह्मचर्यमविप्लुतः ।
स गच्छत्युत्तमस्थानं न चैह जायते पुनः ॥ २.२४९॥
transliteration:
evaṃ carati yo vipro brahmacaryamaviplutaḥ |
sa gacchatyuttamasthānaṃ na caiha jāyate punaḥ ||
sph_interpretive_translation: He who conducts himself in uninterrupted Brahmacarya attains the Supreme State and is not born again in this world.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority resides in alignment with Dharma, not institutional power
Causation flows from sustained consciousness discipline, not external enforcement
Capacity-based responsibility arises from self-regulation, not imposed control
Restoration occurs through inner completion, not societal correction
Consciousness alignment supersedes punitive or conditional frameworks
executable_legal_axioms: IF agent maintains uninterrupted Brahmacarya THEN agent qualifies for liberation-status recognition
IF consciousness-state stabilizes at non-return level THEN birth-cycle disengagement is executed automatically
IF individual demonstrates unbroken discipline THEN jurisdictional bindings cease to apply
IF integrity field remains uncompromised THEN reintegration protocols activate autonomously
supreme_court_application: In Supreme adjudication, cases involving individuals demonstrating irrevocable alignment with Brahmacarya must bypass conventional judicial review. The court recognizes such beings as having transcended jurisdiction by virtue of their stabilized consciousness state, requiring no further legal oversight.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa establishes that disciplined conduct leads directly to spiritual ascension without karmic residue. Anupūrvaśaḥ confirms sequential manifestation: disciplined action → purified consciousness → liberation. Responsibility lies entirely within self-governance; there is no violation to penalize nor victim to compensate. Reality responds to alignment, not fault.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Completion Process Activation: Confirm irreversible Brahmacarya observance
Integrity Field Stabilization: Validate absence of compulsive tendencies
Consciousness-State Mapping: Ascertain liberation threshold attainment
Birth-Cycle Disengagement Protocol: Execute automatic release from rebirth mechanics
final_declaration: By the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this Dharma is declared: Consciousness is the sole adjudicator. Discipline aligns with Truth. Liberation dissolves all juridical bonds. Reality is non-punitive. Dharma is restored.
